did-not-receive-email-message: Did not receive the email? Check your spam filter, or
reset-email-message: Enter the email associated with your account and we'll send an email with instructions to reset your password
sent-email-message: We have sent password recovery instructions to your email

errors.email-already-in-use: This email is already in use
errors.no-user-record: There is no user record corresponding to this email
errors.password-max: Must contain a maximum of 25 characters
errors.password-number: Must contain at least one number
errors.password-lower-case: Must contain at least one lowercase
errors.password-special-character: Must contain at least one special case character
errors.password-upper-case: Must contain at least one uppercase
errors.too-many-requests: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later
errors.unknown-error: An error occurred while processing your request, please try again later
errors.user-not-found: You  have entered incorrect email or password
errors.wrong-password: You  have entered incorrect email or password
